meanings.definition: Not concealed or hidden; in plain view.
meanings.sent1: The cat's undisguised curiosity led it to explore every corner of the room.
meanings.sent2: Her undisguised excitement was evident as she opened the gift.
meanings.sent3: The undisguised joy on his face when he saw the surprise party was priceless.
meanings.sent4: The undisguised truth hit her like a ton of bricks.
meanings.sent5: The undisguised happiness in the room was contagious.

meanings.definition: Not disguised or masked; open and obvious.
meanings.sent1: The undisguised admiration in his eyes was unmistakable.
meanings.sent2: The undisguised anger in her voice made everyone stop and listen.
meanings.sent3: His undisguised love for pizza was evident by the number of slices he ate.
meanings.sent4: The undisguised simplicity of the design appealed to her minimalist taste.
meanings.sent5: The undisguised fear in her eyes told a story of its own.
